name: ProperBeerGlass
0:
”Alexa, ask Proper Beer Glass what style of glass I should use for an Old Ale”
”What is an American Pint”
”Find me the correct glass type for a Barleywine”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: proper beer glass
des: Proper Beer Glass is a skill that will help you decide on the glass that you should use when opening that delicious beer. All glass descriptions and styles to glass types go directly to TrueBeer. The original resource can be found here: http://www.truebeer.com/Beer-Glass-Types_ep_22-1.html
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
